name: opszero-typescript-aws-lambda-template
description: Default template for AWS Lambda functions on opsZero.
author: opsZero

scripts.build: tsc && cp package.json ./build/package.json && cd build && docker run --rm -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs8.10 npm install --production
scripts.local: npm run build && sam local invoke --no-event  --docker-network localdynamodb
